oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Jack Daniel's Distillery advertisement, 1909
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Advertisement for Jack Daniel's Old Time Distillery featuring numerous varieties of Lincoln County sour mash whisky. Some of the products include Jack Daniel's Old No. 7, apple brandy, apricot brandy, peach brandy, and corn whisky. Prices range from $2.00 per gallon to $6.00 per gallon and $12.00 for twelve quarts in a case. At the time of this advertisement in 1909, Jack Daniel Distillery was distributing from a warehouse in Hopkinsville, Ky. This advertisement appears in the 1909 edition of the "Pocket Guide to Greater Nashville." Forms part of the Communities Ephemera Subject Files. 1 advertisement, pg. 13 of booklet.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Daniel, Jack (1846-1911)
